title: Summer Analyst
description: Designed and implemented a data migration tool to transfer petabyte-scale in-house datasets to Snowflake using Apache Flink.
Built Java-based microservices with Jersey and integrated frontend components in React for real-time tracking.
Developed BPMN workflows to improve usability and operational visibility for internal users.

title: Low-Code Automation Developer (Freelance)
description: Automated daily market analysis via n8n workflows integrated with Firecrawl for data extraction.
Stored data using Supabase and enabled a low-code dashboard for non-technical users.

title: Back-end Engineer
description: Built and deployed Flask APIs to analyze cognitive biases in traders using historical data.
Developed a Streamlit dashboard to visualize psychological patterns and behavioral metrics.

title: Prompt Engineer
description: Engineered a Finite State Machine framework driven by LLM prompts to simulate software walkthroughs.
Created prompt-to-action mappings for seamless transitions in video demonstrations.

title: Google Summer of Code Contributor
description: Re-implemented the UX and workflow of the Node Pen Tool to improve usability and reduce latency.
Optimized Bezier Curve rendering through algorithmic tuning to improve performance.
